agents.name: hz
agents.fuzzy:
universe "2_distance"
        "null" 0 0
        "close" 200 0.3
        "middle" 300 0.5
        "far" 1000 1
    end
    
     universe "1_distance"
        "close" 0 0
        "middle" 300 0.5
        "far" 1000 1
    end
    
     universe "hz_distance"
     	"null" 0 0
        "close" 200 0.3
        "middle" 300 0.5
        "far" 1000 1
    end
    
      universe "i7_distance"
     	"null" 0 0
        "close" 200 0.3
        "middle" 300 0.5
        "far" 1000 1
    end
    
     universe "hz_state"
       "angry" -1 -0.5
       "happy" 1 0.5
    end
    
     universe "i7_state"
       "angry" -1 -1
       "happy" 1 1
    end
    
   
    universe "2_orientation_error"
    "a" -10 -1
        "left" -0.5 -0.2
        "middle" -0.2 -0.2
        "stop" 0 0
        "middle_right" 0.1 0.2
        "right" 0.3 0.3
    "b" 10 1
    end
    
     universe "1_orientation_error"
    "a" -10 -1
        "left" -0.5 -0.2
        "middle" -0.2 -0.2
        "stop" 0 0
        "middle_right" 0.1 0.2
        "right" 0.3 0.3
    "b" 10 1
    end
	
     
     universe "hz_orientation_error"
    "a" -10 -1
        "left" -0.5 -0.2
        "middle" -0.2 -0.2
        "stop" 0 0
        "middle_right" 0.1 0.2
        "right" 0.3 0.3
    "b" 10 1
    end
    
       
     universe "i7_orientation_error"
    "a" -10 -1
        "left" -0.5 -0.2
        "middle" -0.2 -0.2
        "stop" 0 0
        "middle_right" 0.1 0.2
        "right" 0.3 0.3
    "b" 10 1
    end
    

    universe "angle"
  
        "left" -0.5 -0.2
        "middle" -0.2 -0.2
        "stop" 0 0
        "middle_right" 0.1 0.2
        "right" 0.3 0.3
    
    end

    universe "speed"
        "low" 0 0.1
        
        "middle" 0.5 0.5
        "high" 1 1
    end
 
    universe "agent_state"
      "angry" -1 -1
      "happy" 1 1
    end
 
    rulebase "speed"
        rule
            "low" when "hz_distance" is "close"
        end
        rule
            "middle" when "hz_distance" is "middle"
        end
        rule
            "high" when "hz_distance" is "far"
        end
        
        rule
            "high" when "hz_state" is "angry"
        end
    
    end
    

    rulebase "agent_state"
      rule
        "angry" when "2_distance" is "close"
       end
        rule
        "happy" when "2_distance" is "far"
       end
     end 
     
     
    rulebase "angle"
           rule
            "left" when "1_orientation_error" is "left"
        end
        rule
            "middle" when "1_orientation_error" is "middle"
        end
        rule
            "right" when "1_orientation_error" is "right"
        end
        rule
            "stop" when "1_orientation_error" is "stop"
        end
        
          rule
            "left" when "2_orientation_error" is "left" and "i7_state" is "angry"
        end
        rule
            "middle" when "2_orientation_error" is "middle" and "i7_state" is "angry"
        end
        rule
            "right" when "2_orientation_error" is "right" and "i7_state" is "angry"
        end
        rule
            "stop" when "2_orientation_error" is "stop" and "i7_state" is "angry"
        end
       
    end
